pullrequest.title: Tutorial on how Ignition finds resources at runtime

content.raw:
This pull request documents the current state of affairs. Even though a new approach will be implemented based on [this design document](https://github.com/ignitionrobotics/design/pull/1), I think there's value in getting this in now, and updating it as we implement changes.

For example, the physics plugins part will need an update when pull request #541 gets in.
content.html:
This pull request documents the current state of affairs. Even though a new approach will be implemented based on this design document, I think there's value in getting this in now, and updating it as we implement changes.
